latest.message:
Project Lumina v1.3.1 is out!

What's new:
- Updated the Connections/Links section to support the GitHub repository and website change.

1.3.0.message:
Project Lumina v1.3.0 is out!

What's new:
- The shortcut now operates directly from a GitHub repository and website, streamlining version control and collaborative contributions. More information is available on the GitHub.
